name: La Linea
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy. A game by: László Rajcsányi -  Wilds, 2023. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0-beta5 by Chris Maltby!  Music by Victor Valdez (https://victorvaldez.itch.io/)

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!


A simple little game that requires mathematical skills, inspired by an Italian cartoon that I loved a lot when I was a child, but even now. The game is recommended for ages 8 and up, only for those who want a quick little game that can be played through in seconds with a little math.


Start the game: Start
Task Solutions: A, B, LEFT/RIGHT

Start the game: Enter
Task Solutions: CTRL, ALT, LEFT/RIGHT
